verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] visit Dallas later this week to speak at the National Rifle Association 's annual convention there , according to a White House official .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: visit] [ARG1: Dallas] [ARGM-TMP: later this week] [ARGM-PRP: to speak at the National Rifle Association 's annual convention there] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a White House official] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] will visit Dallas later this week to [V: speak] [ARGM-LOC: at the National Rifle Association 's annual convention there] , according to a White House official .
President Donald Trump will visit Dallas later this week to speak at the National Rifle Association 's annual convention there , [V: according] to a White House official .
